definitions.body: : 2 K2Ki 13:7 [even Na 2:5, where read [[מַרְאֵיהֶם]] (for [[הֶן]]-) We Now Albr:ZAW xvi (1896), 90] chariotry, chariot, mill-stone; appar. also riders (cf. Lag:BN 151);—abs. ´[[ר]]: Ge 50:9 + , [[רָָכֶב]] 2Sa 8:4 + ; cstr. [[דֶכֶב]] Ex 14:9 + ; sf. [[דִכְבִּי]] Ju Jdg 4:7 + , [[רִכְבּוֹ]] 2Ki 5:9 + , [[דִכְבָּהּ]] Na 2:14; pl. cstr. [[רִבְבֵי]] Ct So 1:9;—Ho 10:13 v. infr.;—

:109 coll. chariotry, chariots [sts. of specific no. 2Ki 13:7, 2Sa 8:4, Ex 14:7 etc.; often + [[פָּרָשִׁים]], ([[ים]]) [[סוּס]]], esp. war-chariots : in Egypt Ex 14:7 (J), Jos 24:6 (E) + ; early Canaan Jos 11:4, Ju Jdg 4:7, Jdg 4:13, Jdg 5:28 (not sg.; ‖[[מַרְכְּבוֹתָיו ]]) + , called [[כַּרְוֶל]] ´[[ר]]: (i.e. iron-bound, or studded, cf. GFM:Ju Jdg 1:19 and reff.), † Jos 17:16, Jos 17:18, Ju Jdg 1:19, Jdg 4:3, Jdg 4:13 † ; Philist., acc. to 1Sa 13:5, 2Sa 1:6; Aram 2Sa 8:4, 2Sa 10:18 + ; Judah and Israel (from David’s time, cf. 2Sa 8:4) 1Ki 9:19, 1Ki 9:22, 1Ki 10:26 + , read also [[בְּרִכְבְּךָ]] Ho 10:13 (for [[בְּדַרְכְּךָ]]) LXX:A We Now GASm; Assyria 2Ki 19:23 = Is 37:24, Na 2:4, Na 2:5, Na 2:14 (to be burnt; made mainly of wood); Babyl. Je 47:3 (on title v:Je 47:1, see Gf Gie), Je 50:37, Je 51:21, Ez Eze 23:24 + , etc.; for dignity and display 1Ki 1:5, 2Ki 5:9, Je 17:25, Je 22:4, Is 66:20, cf. Ge 50:9 (J), (cf. also 1Ki 9:19, 1Ki 9:22, 1Ki 10:26, etc.); fig. of Elijah, [[יִשְׂרָאֵל וּפָרָשׁיו]] ´[[ר]]: 2Ki 2:12, of elisha 2Ki 13:14; [[רֶכֶב אֵשׁ]] 2Ki 2:11 chariotry of fire (at Elijah’s translation); [[אֵל]] ´[[ר]]: Ps 68:18 chariots of Ēl, i.e. his heavenly host, cf. vision 2Ki 6:17, and also 2Ki 7:6; ´[[ר]]: meton, for chariot-horses 2Sa 8:4 = 1Ch 18:4. †
of single chariot 1Ki 22:35, 1Ki 22:38, 2Ki 9:21, 2Ki 9:21, 2Ki 9:24, 2Ki 10:16, 2Ch 35:24, prob. also Ex 14:6; pl. [[רִכְבֵי פַרְעׂה]] Ct So 1:9. †
upper millstone (as riding on the lower) De 24:6, Ju Jdg 9:53, 2Sa 11:21.

appar. = riders (coll.), troop (of riders): [[שְׁנֵי]] [[רֶכֶב סוּסִים]] 2Ki 7:14 two riders of horses, horsemen (ro two chariots drawn by horses ?); in foll. text dub.: [[גׇּמֶל]] ´[[חֲמוֹר ר]] :´[[חֶמֶד פָרָשִׁים ר]] :´[[ד]]: Is 21:7 riders, viz. a pair of horsemen, ass-riders, camel-rides; cf. [[אִישׁ חֶמֶד פָּרָשִׁים]] ´[[ר]]: v:Is 21:9 i.e. men riding, a pair of horsemen; [[אָדָם פָּרָשִׁים]] ´[[בְּד]]: Is 22:6 with riders (consisting of) men, horsemen, but use of [[אָדָם]] very improb.; attractive is with chariotry of (drawn by) steeds (´[[א]]: as gloss) Du Che:Hpt Di-Kit but ´[[פ]]: hardly steeds here (cf. ´[[פ]]: horsemen, v:Is 22:7); read perhaps simply ´[[וּפ]] :´[[בְּר]]:.
